name: Manic Panic Hair Dye
description:
MANIC PANIC AMPLIFIED FORMULA Semi-Permanent hair colours 

Manic Panic is our top brand for hair colours, the colours are amazing and the results (particularly with the red colours) are the best we've found. Amplified cream hair dyes have been created especially for MANIC PANIC devotees who seek more permanence from their semi-permanent. In the 13 best selling shades plus 2 super-naturals, the formulation has the same gentle-to-the-hair dye with all natural ingredients that is now stronger and lasts up to 30% than the standard semi-permanent dye! Not tested on animals and contains no animal products.

USEFUL INFO: 

Dyes generally last around 2-6 weeks and will fade out over time (depending largely on how often you wash your hair - we've found dry hair shampoo is a great way of prolonging the results).
Dye results may vary depending on hair type, hair porosity & base colour. Lighter colours and blues work much better on very light/lemon yellow bleached hair.

For best results use on bleached or pre-lightened hair, however, some colours may give a sheen/hint of colour to darker hair Colours in the tub/bottle are not necessarily an indication of the final hair colour. 
Dye results cannot be guaranteed always try a strand test to check possible results. 
Always follow manufacturers instructions fully.
